definition: variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.english: About noon the robbers visited their cave.
sentences.chinese: 到了中午强盗们来视察他们的山洞了。

sentences.english: On April 1, Thornburgh accompanied President Jimmy Carter on a tour of Three Mile Island.
sentences.chinese: 4月1日，索恩伯勒陪同总统吉米卡特视察了三里岛。

sentences.english: When SSH jokes, he will turn his head and look for KTHsreaction.
sentences.chinese: 宋承宪讲冷笑话的时间回头视察泰熙反映。

sentences.english: After inspecting the school he showed his satisfaction with warm words.
sentences.chinese: 视察完后，他用热情的话语表达了墅对学校的满意。

sentences.english: He has also overseen the country's rapid oil-driven growth.
sentences.chinese: 他也视察了国家经济在石油的驱动下飞速增长。

sentences.english: Wen made an inspection tour in Jilin Province from July 25 to 27.
sentences.chinese: 从7月25日到27日，温总理在吉林省做一个视察。

sentences.english: Also inspect the opening of the ear canal for discharge, swelling, or redness.
sentences.chinese: 还视察外耳道孔的排写物，肿胀，或发红。

sentences.english: Premier Wen Jiabao flied to Chengdu to oversee rescue operation.
sentences.chinese: 地震后，温家宝总理第一时间赶到灾区视察救灾工作。

sentences.english: Chinese Premier Wen Jiabao rushed to Zhouqu county to oversee relief efforts.
sentences.chinese: 中国总理温家宝冲到舟曲县一线视察救灾工作。

sentences.english: Horizontal sight and visual glasses are provided operational sight for user.
sentences.chinese: 平视式视察，为使用者提供舒适的操作视线。

sentences.english: The minister paid tribute to the work of the emergency services.
sentences.chinese: 这位部长前来视察救援工作。

sentences.english: He said it was the company'sdecision to give them up and stop research. The USDA inspected the site this week and has started a formal investigation.
sentences.chinese: 美国农业部本周视察了现场，并已开始正式调查。

sentences.english: The education officers ought to visit the schools regularly.
sentences.chinese: 教育部门的官员应定期视察各个学校。

sentences.english: Time passed by, and a visit made by the Chief Officer of Prisons.
sentences.chinese: 时间一晃眼就过去了，巡狱长官准备要来做一次视察。

sentences.english: After Sun Yat-sen visited back and Yuet Chau.
sentences.chinese: 孙中山视察过后，回到和悦洲。

sentences.english: The inspector was interested in everything pertaining to the school.
sentences.chinese: 视察员对有关学校的一切都感兴趣。

definition: to receive sb/to grant an interview
to patrol/to make a tour/to inspect/to scan with one's eyes
to meet with (sb who is paying a visit)/CL:次[ci4]
to report/to give an account of/report
to report/to give an account of/to collect information and report back
call in (one's subordinates)/summon (an envoy of a foreign country) to an interview
pay an official call/call on/visit in an official capacity
to pay a visit/to call on
to express sympathy, greetings, consolation etc
